Author: UniDAG
Title: [ANN][ICO][BOUNTY] |ðŸ’¢Blockchain+DAG ðŸ’¢ UniDAG EcosystemðŸ’¢|
Body: Complete update of the UniDAG project Dear community, project participants and all interested people! In connection with the expansion of the UniDAG team in the form of individual groups and new candidates for the UniDAG consortium, the change in the official policy in relation to cryptocurrencies in many countries and the general instability of the current state of all cryptoworld, the project management decided to carry out a general reformatting of the project by making the necessary adjustments and implementing the project's features in compliance with internal and external regulations. The UniDAG project was and remains an adherent to the philosophy of freedom, openness and officiality, therefore all detailed information will be published on the official resources of the project regarding each direction as agreed by the project participants and approval by the administration. For the time of a full update, the UniDAG project should be considered frozen. As a consequence, the current smart contract should be considered invalid, and tokens from it will be destroyed, except paid for the bounty program (https://medium.com/unidag/unidag-project-updating-bounty-campaign-c8894bdcf330). After the internal restructuring of the project, new ICO rules will be announced, and an updated address of the launched smart contract will be provided. NO ONE OF THE ADMINISTRATION AND PROJECT TEAM WILL SEND TO YOU ETH OR ANY ADDRESS IN PERSONAL MESSAGE! IT IS SCAMERS, BE CAREFUL! Despite the announcement, social networks will continue to function, and at any time you can ask your questions in our chat rooms. We strongly recommend subscribing to our newsletter (https://eepurl.com/dyeGOb), so as not to miss the period of swap of old tokens for new We are grateful to all members of the community who joined us at an early stage, supported us throughout this time and continued and continue to maintain the trust in the UniDAG project We apologize, with best regards, the UniDAG project team!

Author: UniDAG
Title: [ANN][ICO][BOUNTY] |ðŸ’¢Blockchain+DAG ðŸ’¢ UniDAG EcosystemðŸ’¢|
Body: âŒ‚Dear community! In the next few weeks, https://unidag.com will be unavailable from 23:00 to 00:00 daily due to technical works and updates. We apologize, the UniDAG project team. âŒ‚The first round of the ERC-20 UniDAG token (UDAG)  crowdsale starts. Visit https://unidag.com to participate in the crowdsale and get 33 % discount! âŒ‚Dear community! We hear our community and appreciate its contribution to the development of the project.  Based on the results of the first reports, it became clear who wants to support the project, so the bounty team took the following decision. Regardless of what color you were marked at the beginning of the reporting month, if you make posts and reposts, then you have all the chances to occupy the place of the person who passed the selection at the end of the month, but missed the delivery of the report.  You can check the FaceBook spreadsheet and see the update. Best regards and thanks, UniDAG team.

Title: [ANN][ICO][BOUNTY] |ðŸ’¢Blockchain+DAG ðŸ’¢ UniDAG EcosystemðŸ’¢|
Body: Complete update of the UniDAG project  Dear community, project participants and all interested people! In connection with the expansion of the UniDAG team in the form of individual groups and new candidates for the UniDAG consortium, the change in the official policy in relation to cryptocurrencies in many countries and the general instability of the current state of all cryptoworld, the project management decided to carry out a general reformatting of the project by making the necessary adjustments and implementing the project's features in compliance with internal and external regulations.  The UniDAG project was and remains an adherent to the philosophy of freedom, openness and officiality, therefore all detailed information will be published on the official resources of the project regarding each direction as agreed by the project participants and approval by the administration.  For the time of a full update, the UniDAG project should be considered frozen. As a consequence, the current smart contract should be considered invalid, and tokens from it will be destroyed, except paid for the bounty program (https://[Suspicious link removed]/hnqp3t).  After the internal restructuring of the project, new ICO rules will be announced, and an updated address of the launched smart contract will be provided. NO ONE OF THE ADMINISTRATION AND PROJECT TEAM WILL SEND TO YOU ETH OR ANY ADDRESS IN PERSONAL MESSAGE! IT IS SCAMERS, BE CAREFUL!  Despite the announcement, social networks will continue to function, and at any time you can ask your questions in our chat rooms. We strongly recommend subscribing to our newsletter ( http://[Suspicious link removed]/dyeGOb ), so as not to miss the period of swap of old tokens for new  We are grateful to all members of the community who joined us at an early stage, supported us throughout this time and continued and continue to maintain the trust in the UniDAG project  We apologize, with best regards, the UniDAG project team! Title: [ANN][ICO][BOUNTY] |ðŸ’¢Blockchain+DAG ðŸ’¢ UniDAG EcosystemðŸ’¢|
Body: 1. Thank you for review of our project. We fixed bad translation . 2. The current version of  the WhitePAPER is not full now, and will be added with all information about structure and open source economy. We are working hard to show all our ideas in right case and implement them ASAP. Please, don't be so cantankerous  3. Yevhenii Doshyn is the founder of unidag technology. He founded all unidag dagchain rules and frameworks,  all technical solutions like open / closed blocks and dagchain pairs etc. May be , he is not well known now, but that is not his mission

Author: kalunomics
Title: [ANN][ICO][BOUNTY] |ðŸ’¢Blockchain+DAG ðŸ’¢ UniDAG EcosystemðŸ’¢|
Body: We are living in the world of publicity and transparency, where every person should have the right to influence the vector of the movement of the society in which he/she is located and the right to receive information as the movement proceeds. At the same time, the duties of observing these rights are imposed on other people. We should always strive to make sure that the freedom of one person becomes the quintessence of freedom for the whole society as a whole. DAG technology is a gift to humanity and I support almost each and everyone of them I come across. I wish the team all the best in implementing this
